alert.note: Alert for Brazoria Islands; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Matagorda; Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Matagorda; Matagorda Islands; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 1:29PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will produce strong wind gusts portions of eastern Wharton, southeastern Fort Bend, Brazoria, northeastern Matagorda and southern Harris Counties through 230 PM CST... At 128 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Fairchilds to 13 miles south of Matagorda. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pearland, southeastern Missouri City, Matagorda, Lake Jackson, Alvin, Angleton, eastern Bay City, Freeport, Clute, Manvel, West Columbia, Sweeny, Surfside Beach, Fresno, Richwood, Brazoria, Needville, Jones Creek, Danbury and Arcola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southeastern Texas.
